text: Lars Møller Madsen (born 30 May 1981 in Ølgod, Denmark) is a Danish team handball player. From 1 January 2011 he plays for the Swedish club IFK Kristianstad. He is European Champion by winning the 2008 European Men's Handball Championship with the Danish national handball team. ==External links== *EM-truppen, Schweiz 2006 at Danish Handball Federation *Portrætfotos af Herre-A VM-truppen 2007 at Danish Handball Federation *EM-truppen, EM Norge 2008 at Danish Handball Federation Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:People from Varde Municipality Category:Danish male handball players Category:IFK Kristianstad players
title: Lars Møller Madsen
